PAD_Massacre.synopsis: This PAD happens if Halsin escapes the Goblin Camp on his own and then the player enteres the Worg Pens and sees corpses of dead goblins and worgs.

PAD_Massacre_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Massacre_1.text: Claw marks and spells. Is this Halsin's doing? Did he return to the grove?
PAD_Massacre_1.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player has heard about the missing druid, Halsin. - one player version.

PAD_Massacre_2.speaker: Player
PAD_Massacre_2.text: This must've been where they imprisoned Halsin.
PAD_Massacre_2.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player has met halsin after he escaped.

PAD_Massacre_5.speaker: Player
PAD_Massacre_5.text: Someone escaped. One of the adventurers?

PAD_Massacre_3.speaker: Player
PAD_Massacre_3.text: Whoever did it left quite some claw marks. Maybe the missing druid?
PAD_Massacre_3.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player has heard about the missing fruid, Halsin.

PAD_Massacre_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Massacre_0.text: He must have returned to the grove.

PAD_Massacre_4.speaker: Player
PAD_Massacre_4.text: If so, they might have returned to the grove.
PAD_Massacre_4.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player hasn't heard about the missing druid.

PAD_Massacre_6.speaker: Player
PAD_Massacre_6.text: All slaughtered. Looks like their prisoner escaped.
PAD_Massacre_6.context: InternalNodeContext: Fallback in case the player has never been to the grove and couldn't logically mention the grove.

PAD_Massacre_7.speaker: Player
PAD_Massacre_7.text: Someone escaped. One of the adventurers? Did they go back to the grove?
PAD_Massacre_7.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player hasn't heard about the missing druid. - one player version.
